metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20051 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A floating-point exception was discovered in PackLinuxElf::elf_hash in p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.95. The vulnerability causes an application crash, which leads to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
